# Security Policy

## Supported versions

Only the latest release line is supported with security updates.

## Reporting a vulnerability

Please do not open public issues for security problems.

Use one of these private channels:

1. GitHub Security Advisory (preferred).
2. Email: <report@eml.cc>

Include:

- Affected version/commit.
- Reproduction steps or proof of concept.
- Impact assessment.
- Suggested fix (if available).

We will acknowledge reports within 72 hours and coordinate disclosure.
Please do not disclose vulnerabilities publicly until a fix is available.
